name: Giant Albino Bat
languages: Abyssal, understands Common but can’t speak it

actions.desc: The bat makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) slashing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is grappled (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the bat can’t use its claws against another target.
actions.name: Claws

special_abilities.desc: The bat can’t use its blindsight while deafened.
special_abilities.name: Echolocation

special_abilities.desc: The bat has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.
special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing
